meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cliquish
meanings.sent1: In high school, the cliquishnesses among students made it hard for new kids to fit in.
meanings.sent2: The cliquishnesses in the office led to some employees feeling left out.
meanings.sent3: The cliquishnesses at the party were so strong that even the snacks formed their own exclusive group.
meanings.sent4: The cliquishnesses in the neighborhood were like invisible walls separating the residents.
meanings.sent5: The cliquishnesses of the cats in the alley made it seem like they had their own secret society.

meanings.definition: The tendency to form exclusive groups or cliques
meanings.sent1: Her cliquishnesses often made it challenging for others to join her circle of friends.
meanings.sent2: The cliquishnesses of the students in the cafeteria were evident as they sat at the same table every day.
meanings.sent3: The cliquishnesses of the vegetables in the fridge made it seem like they were plotting against the fruits.
meanings.sent4: The cliquishnesses of the clouds in the sky created patterns that only a few could decipher.
meanings.sent5: The cliquishnesses of the birds in the park made it feel like they were holding a secret meeting.
